name: VAPORTRAIN
description:
VAPORTRAIN! 

This is a prototype of an idea about mixing a tap game with trains and vaporwave style, in this game you have to tap correctly to drop a wagon and continue progressing more meters!

If you fail your tap, your train will explote! 

All the sounds, graphics and effects are vaporwave style!

Complete all the levels! Unlock powerups and skins! Collect all trains!

VAPORTRAIN!
